vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀστᾰτέω,
to be never at rest, πόλοιο φορὰν.. -έουσαν[Refs]; of the sea, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 to be unsettled, to be a wanderer, [NT]; to be inconstant, περὶ τοὺς γάμους[Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be homeless, a vagabond
to be unsettled, to be a wanderer, be homeless, a vagabond 1Cor. 4:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: errante, estar sin hogar, vagar de lugar a lugar
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lưu lạc; sống đời phiêu bạt không nhà.
